name: Kanji Takahashi (高橋 寛治)
body:
I'm 2 degrees of master's student in Nagaoka University of Technology.
My research topic is natural language processing.

### Research Interest
- Japanese processing, Vietnamese processing
- Developing NLP tool
- Fundamental analysis such as word segmentation and part-of-speech tagging

### Publications
- Kazuhide Yamamoto and Kanji Takahashi. Japanese Orthographical Normalization Do Not Work for Statistical Machine Translation. Proceedings of the International Conference on Asian Language Processing (IALP 2016), (2016.11 scheduled)
- Kanji Takahashi and Kazuhide Yamamoto. Fundamental Tools and Resource is Available for Vietnamese Analysis. Proceedings of the International Conference on Asian Language Processing (IALP 2016), (2016.11scheduled)
- Kazuhide Yamamoto and Kanji Takahashi. Japanese Orthographical Normalization Does Not Work for Statistical Machine Translation. The 16th China-Japan Natural Language Processing Collaboration Promotion Conference (CJNLP 2016), (2016.9)
- 山本 和英, 高橋 寛治, 桾澤 優希. 日本語支援動詞構文の述部に対するサ変動詞への換言. 言語処理学会第22回年次大会, (2016.3)
- 山本 和英, 高橋 寛治, 西山 浩気. 動詞-名詞対応辞書の構築と敬語の常体への換言. 言語処理学会第22回年次大会, (2016.3)
- 山本和英, 高橋寛治. 語彙統制のための同義語集合の資源化. 電子情報通信学会 テキストマイニングシンポジウム, 信学技報, , Vol.115, No.222, pp.7-12 (2015.9)
- Kazuhide Yamamoto and Kanji Takahashi. Construction of Japanese Semantically Compatible Words Resource. Proceedings of the International Conference on Asian Language Processing (IALP 2015), pp.61-64 (Oct 2015, scheduled) 

### Tools and Resources
- SNOWMAN
- n-gram tool for SNOWMAN 
- SNOW D9:Japanese part-of-speech correspondence dictionary between noun and verb
- SNOW T10:normalized Japanese text of The Kyoto Free Translation Task
- NLP Web Demonstration Template
- SNOW Vietnamese Morphological Analyzer with SVMs
- SNOW Vietnamese Morphological Analyzer with CRFs
- SNOW Vietnamese Diacritics Restoration
- Vietnamese Preprocessing Scripts
- Out line of Vietnamese NLP
- word2vec demonstration

### SNS
- Twitter
- Eight
- SlideShare
- LinkedIn
- Qiita
- Blog
